extendedInfo.description: New! My latest game - Kids Colors (Fireworks) - teaches your little one colors using the magic of fireworks.The easiest coloring book for your toddler. Select a color and fill away! Now with 8 backgrounds! This game is ad-free!User reviews:âââââ My toddler sits and plays this really well on her own and loves how easy it is to change colours and colouring pictures. ââââââââââ My 2 year old loves this.. by far the best coloring app because it's not hard to color with just your finger...she is so proud to finish a page and loves the great color selection! ââââââââââ This is an awesome coloring app both of my daughters, one 4yrs and the other 2yrs love using it. âââââPro version contains 58 coloring sheets!Ad-free - your little one will not see any ads! Now with option to unlock all coloring sheets by completing an offer from our sponsors. This section is protected by a toddler guard so your little one can't get there.Permissions are required for the offers and will not be used otherwise.Check out my other games for toddlers and preschool kids: - Kids Animal Piano  - Kids Halloween Piano - Kids Colors (Fireworks) - new! - Toddler Fireworks - Color Ripple for Toddlers - Escape The Bee - Toddler SmudgeIf you need a toddler lock for any of these games, download Toddler Central, a universal toddler lock!Note: this game has been primarily designed for toddlers, but it's equally great for your baby or infant and even for older kids.Keywords: coloring, coloring book, children, kid, toddler, baby, infant, child, game, play, toddler, drawing, tap to color, toddler coloring, color

reviews.title: Happy parent happy children
reviews.comment: This app is so simple and fun my children love it.
reviews.author: Keila Alvarez-Olivo

reviews.title: Kids loves it
reviews.comment: This is a great apps my kids loved it! They can easily choose a color to the drawings.. will give it 5 stars if more drawing sheets available..
reviews.author: Fritzie Irish Ty

reviews.title: Why remove the extra pictures the day after I rated you?! :-(
reviews.comment: My toddler sits and plays this really well on her own and loves how easy it is to change colours and colouring pictures. Thanks!   Update since my initial rating downgraded from five stars to three because you took away the extra colouring pictures a day after I rated you. I couldn\'t explain to my daughter where the new pictures she wanted had gone! Please reinstate them for a better rating :-(
reviews.author: Shareen Shaw

reviews.title: Simple fun
reviews.comment: This app encourages creativity. My three year old loves it & it\'s great to keep her entertained so I can grocery shop.
reviews.author: Kelly Wood

reviews.title: Fun app
reviews.comment: Easy to use, fun colors and designs. Like the simple designs, perfect for toddlers.
reviews.author: Kimberly Welton

reviews.title: Entertaining & add free!!
reviews.comment: My kids haven\'t played this long but so far I really like it. Gave it 4 instead of 5 because i really like for their apps to be educational. There are no adds and has a child lock!
reviews.author: Hayley Jones

reviews.comment: Very cool app. I think I love it just as much as my daughter does. Love that its locked too. Good job!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: My little sister LOVES this I realy like the various colors
reviews.comment: Great Love it. Wold be better if it said the color you pick
reviews.author: lashawna harris

reviews.title: Best Activity for a Toddler
reviews.comment: Love this app. It was very easy to download. The colors kept my toddler busy and entertained during a meeting. The app is also very user friendly.
reviews.author: Roberta Johnson

reviews.title: My kid loves this
reviews.comment: My 4 yr old really likes this.. Its simple easy good for small kids
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: COLORFUL
reviews.comment: I love that there are so many colors to choose from. My 3 year old loves this app  & loves painting pretty pictures all day :)
reviews.author: Kayla Marie

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: my 2 year old loves it nice simple pictures an nice colors great job!!!!
reviews.author: Alyssa Howell

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: This game is cool my cousin loves it so much...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Cool app, the kids love it! Easy to use :-)
reviews.author: Danielle Butts

reviews.title: Simple and fun
reviews.comment: My son loves this! So easy and fun keeps him quiet for ages :)
reviews.author: Tanya D\'Angelo

reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
reviews.comment: Super easy and vibrant colors! My 3 year old loves it!
reviews.author: earnold81

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: My two year old loved this app. And it was so easy because they dont color.outside the lines. Great app. I recommend it to all parents.
reviews.author: Candace Shaw

reviews.title: Blake4
reviews.comment: like the cool color choices. Its 2012 tho...why only just a few pics to color....shuld gv @dozen at least. Cool app :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy & Fun
reviews.comment: My 2 year old loves playing and coloring with this app. He loves recognizing the animals and colors.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Toddler Coloring Book
reviews.comment: Love that colors sections at a time. Lots of color choices.
reviews.author: Carrie Wagner
